languages.text: "Я... так себе выгляжу, да?" {n}Идира облизывает пересохшие губы — язык псайкерши распух и побелел.{/n} "Я... плохо чувствую свое тело. Подумать только, когда-то я и не задумывалась, что могу помереть физически, а не поплавиться мозгами..."

"I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."
languages.original_text: "Я... так себе выгляжу, да?" {n}Идира облизывает пересохшие губы — язык псайкерши распух и побелел.{/n} "Я... плохо чувствую свое тело. Подумать только, когда-то я и не задумывалась, что могу помереть физически, а не поплавиться мозгами..."

traits.locale_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes and not from my brain melting away..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「私…酷い姿でしょう？」{n}イディラは乾いた唇を舐める。舌は青白く腫れている。{/n}「私…体の感覚がないの。はぁ。脳が溶けて死ぬんだと思ってた」
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: 「私…酷い姿でしょう？」{n}イディラは乾いた唇を舐める。舌は青白く腫れている。{/n}「私…体の感覚がないの。はぁ。脳が溶けて死ぬんだと思ってた」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我……我看起来不太好，是吗？”{n}伊迪拉舔着干裂的嘴唇，舌头又肿又白。{/n}“我……好像感觉不到我的身体了。呵，我一直以为我的脑子会烧化，从来没想过可能会虚弱而死……”
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: “我……我看起来不太好，是吗？”{n}伊迪拉舔着干裂的嘴唇，舌头又肿又白。{/n}“我，呃，我好像感觉不到我的身体了。呵，我一直以为我会死于大脑融化，从来没想过可能会虚弱而死……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No... tengo buen aspecto, ¿verdad?». {n}Idira se lame los labios resecos. Su lengua está hinchada y pálida.{/n} «No puedo, eh, sentir del todo mi cuerpo. Oh. Nunca pensé que podría morir por causas físicas. Pensaba que ser me fundiría el cerebro o algo...».
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: «No... tengo buen aspecto, ¿verdad?». {n}Idira se lame los labios resecos. Su lengua está hinchada y pálida.{/n} «No puedo, eh, sentir del todo mi cuerpo. Oh. Nunca pensé que podría morir por causas físicas y no porque se me derritiera el cerebro...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... sehe nicht sonderlich gut aus, was?" {n}Idira leckt sich die trockenen Lippen. Ihre Zunge ist geschwollen und blass.{/n} "Ich ... kann meinen Körper nicht richtig spüren. Hm. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich einmal Gefahr laufe, aus körperlichen Gründen zu sterben. Ich dachte immer, ich würde sterben, weil mein Gehirn schmilzt ..."
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... sehe nicht sonderlich gut aus, was?" {n}Idira leckt sich die trockenen Lippen. Ihre Zunge ist angeschwollen und blass.{/n} "Ich, äh, kann meinen Körper nicht richtig spüren. Hm. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich mal Gefahr laufe, aus körperlichen Gründen zu sterben. Und nicht, weil mein Gehirn schmilzt ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « C'est vrai que je n'ai pas l'air en forme... » {n}dit Idira en passant une langue gonflée et pâle sur ses lèvres desséchées.{/n} « Je... ne sens plus trop mon corps. Hum... Qui aurait pu deviner que je mourrai de causes physiques, et non parce que mon cerveau aura fini en bouillie ? »
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai que je n'ai pas l'air en forme... » {n}Idira passe une langue gonflée et pâle sur ses lèvres desséchées.{/n} « Je... ne sens plus trop mon corps. Ha. Qui aurait pu deviner que je mourrai de causes physiques, et non parce que mon cerveau aura fini en bouillie ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sağlığım pek... Yerinde değil sanki, değil mi?" {n}İdira, kurumuş dudaklarını ıslatıyor. Dili şişmiş, rengi solmuş.{/n} "Aslında... Vücudumu pek hissedemiyorum. Şey... Fiziksel nedenlerden ölme riskine gireceğimi hiç beklemezdim. Hep beynim eriyip gidecek diye korkardım..."
languages.original_text: "I... don't look so good, do I?" {n}Idira licks her parched lips. Her tongue is swollen and pale.{/n} "I... can't really feel my body. Huh. I never thought I'd be in danger of dying of physical causes, I always thought it'd be from my brain melting away to nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "Pek... Sağlığım yerinde değil sanki, değil mi?" {n}İdira kurumuş dudaklarını ıslatıyor. Dili şişip rengi solmuş.{/n} "Aslında... Vücudumu pek hissedemiyorum. Hımm. Fiziksel nedenlerden ölme riskine gireceğimi hiç beklemezdim. Hep beynim eriyip gidecek diye korkardım..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
